DOC.brief_summary: A health coach intervention pre-disease ( pre-hypertension pre-diabetes ) without pre-existing cardiovascular disease effectively help participant change lifestyle behaviour prevent delay onset cardiovascular disease .
DOC.brief_title: Health Coaching Effect Lifestyle Behaviour Change
DOC.criteria: Age 4060 year Last record fast blood glucose 6.0 abd 6.9 mmol/L Last record blood pressure 130139 mmHG systolic and/or8589 mmHG diastolic Diagnosis diabetes chart Diagnosis hypertension chart take antidiabetic medication take antihypertensive medication
